ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 129 - (Nova Scotia) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 129 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the severe RAINSTORM that affected Cape Breton on August 21 and 22, 2010.
